snippet: Jason Kidd, who played 19 years but has not coached, proposed adding veteran coaches to his bench as a way to offset his inexperience.
abstract: Jason Kidd, who retired after one season with New York Knicks, makes his pitch for vacant Brooklyn Nets coaching job.
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd, who played 19 years but has not coached, proposed adding veteran coaches to his bench as a way to offset his inexperience.

headline.seo: Jason Kidd Meets With Nets About Coaching job
headline.main: Kidd Meets With Nets About Coaching Job
headline.print_headline: In Interview, Kidd Floats Frank’s Name
